government_scholarships.name: National Scholarship Portal (NSP) Scholarships
government_scholarships.provider: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
government_scholarships.description: Centralized scholarship program for ITI students from economically weaker sections.
eligibility: Family income less than ₹2.5 lakh per annum
Regular ITI student in government recognized institute
government_scholarships.application_process: Apply online through National Scholarship Portal (www.scholarships.gov.in)
government_scholarships.success_rate: 70% of eligible applicants receive the scholarship

government_scholarships.name: Post-Matric Scholarship for SC/ST Students
government_scholarships.provider: Ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment
government_scholarships.description: Financial assistance for SC/ST students pursuing ITI courses.
eligibility: Family income below ₹2.5 lakh per annum
government_scholarships.application_process: Apply through National Scholarship Portal or state-specific portals
government_scholarships.success_rate: 85% of eligible applicants receive the scholarship

government_scholarships.name: Prime Minister's Scholarship Scheme for ITI Students
government_scholarships.description: Special scholarship for students pursuing high-demand trades in ITIs.
eligibility: Pursuing courses in high-demand sectors (manufacturing, healthcare, automotive)
Family income below ₹8 lakh per annum
benefits: Tuition fee waiver up to ₹20,000 per year
government_scholarships.application_process: Apply online through Skill Development Ministry portal or through ITI institute
government_scholarships.success_rate: 60% of eligible applicants receive the scholarship

state_scholarships.name: State Merit Scholarship for ITI Students
state_scholarships.description: Merit-based scholarship for top-performing ITI students in each state.
eligibility: Top 10% rank in ITI entrance exam or previous semester
state_scholarships.application_process: Apply through respective state technical education portal or through ITI institute
state_scholarships.deadline: Varies by state, check with local ITI
state_scholarships.website: Check respective state technical education website
state_scholarships.contact: Contact state directorate of technical education
state_scholarships.success_rate: Top 10% students in each trade receive the scholarship

state_scholarships.name: Minority Community Scholarship for ITI
state_scholarships.description: Financial assistance for students from minority communities pursuing ITI courses.
eligibility: Family income below ₹3 lakh per annum
state_scholarships.application_process: Apply through State Minority Welfare Department or online state scholarship portal
state_scholarships.website: Check respective state minority welfare department website
state_scholarships.success_rate: 75% of eligible applicants receive the scholarship

industry_scholarships.name: Tata Motors ITI Scholarship Program
industry_scholarships.description: Industry-sponsored scholarship for ITI students pursuing automobile related trades.
eligibility: Enrolled in automobile related trades (Mechanic Motor Vehicle, Electrician, Machinist)
Family income below ₹5 lakh per annum
ITI located in operational areas of Tata Motors
industry_scholarships.application_process: Apply through ITI institution or directly to Tata Motors CSR division

industry_scholarships.name: Maruti Suzuki Technical Scholarship
industry_scholarships.description: Scholarship for promising ITI students in automotive and allied trades.
eligibility: Pursuing Mechanic Motor Vehicle, Mechanic Auto Electrical & Electronics trades
ITIs located near Maruti Suzuki facilities
benefits: Tuition fee support up to ₹20,000 per year
Internship opportunity at Maruti Suzuki facilities
industry_scholarships.application_process: Apply through ITI institution or Maruti Suzuki authorized center

industry_scholarships.name: Larsen & Toubro Construction Skills Scholarship
industry_scholarships.description: Scholarship for ITI students in construction-related trades.
eligibility: Pursuing Civil, Electrical, or Plumbing trades
industry_scholarships.application_process: Apply through ITI institution or L&T Construction Skills Training Centers
industry_scholarships.success_rate: 60% of eligible applicants receive the scholarship

special_category_scholarships.name: Scholarship for Women in Technical Education
special_category_scholarships.provider: Ministry of Women and Child Development
special_category_scholarships.description: Special scholarship to encourage women to pursue ITI courses and technical education.
eligibility: Female candidates enrolled in any ITI trade
Family income below ₹6 lakh per annum
benefits: Tuition fee reimbursement up to ₹25,000 per year
special_category_scholarships.application_process: Apply online through National Scholarship Portal or Women and Child Development portal
special_category_scholarships.success_rate: 80% of eligible applicants receive the scholarship

special_category_scholarships.name: Divyangjan ITI Scholarship Scheme
special_category_scholarships.provider: Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
special_category_scholarships.description: Scholarship for differently-abled students pursuing ITI courses.
eligibility: Persons with disabilities (40% or more disability)
Family income below ₹3 lakh per annum
benefits: Reader allowance for visually impaired students
Escort allowance for severely disabled students
special_category_scholarships.application_process: Apply through National Scholarship Portal or Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities
special_category_scholarships.success_rate: 90% of eligible applicants receive the scholarship

special_category_scholarships.name: Scholarship for Wards of Construction Workers
special_category_scholarships.description: Scholarship for children of registered construction workers pursuing ITI courses.
eligibility: Parent/guardian registered with Construction Workers Welfare Board for at least 1 year
benefits: Tuition fee reimbursement up to ₹20,000 per year
special_category_scholarships.application_process: Apply through State Construction Workers Welfare Board office or authorized ITI nodal officer
special_category_scholarships.deadline: Rolling applications, check with local welfare board
special_category_scholarships.website: Check respective state construction workers welfare board website
special_category_scholarships.contact: Contact state construction workers welfare board
special_category_scholarships.success_rate: 75% of eligible applicants receive the scholarship

international_scholarships.name: Indo-German Dual Vocational Training Scholarship
international_scholarships.description: Scholarship for exceptional ITI students to undergo dual training in Germany.
eligibility: Top 5% performers in specified ITI trades
benefits: Fully funded training in Germany for 3-6 months
international_scholarships.application_process: Apply through Ministry of Skill Development or GIZ India office
international_scholarships.success_rate: Highly competitive, approximately 20 scholarships awarded annually
